# Get Your Business Online

This website offers professional web development services, primarily focusing on creating WordPress sites for local businesses. With a straightforward four-step process, users can quickly establish an online presence, tailored to their specific needs. Alongside WordPress site development, the site offers custom web applications and team mentoring to enhance tech skills.

## About My Work

This section outlines the approach taken in web development, emphasizing a **four-step process**:
1. **Discovery Call**: A 15-minute conversation to understand the client's business and website needs.
2. **Content & Design**: Building the site using the client's content, followed by a round of revisions.
3. **Launch**: The website goes live within 5 business days, with all technical aspects managed.
4. **Ongoing Support**: Includes 30 days of post-launch support for any inquiries.

### What You Can Expect
- **No Jargon**: Clear explanations ensure clients understand the process.
- **Fixed Pricing**: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees or surprises.
- **Real Experience**: Over 27 years in tech, with extensive knowledge of web development.
- **Ongoing Support**: Continuous availability for questions after launch.

### A Bit About Me
The developer has significant experience in the tech industry, transitioning from systems administration to full-stack development. The motivation to help local businesses succeed online is a driving force behind the services provided.

### Ready to Get Started?
Interested individuals are encouraged to initiate a discussion about their web presence needs by visiting the services page or viewing past projects.

### Links
- [Get Your Business Online](/services)
- [View My Work](/projects)

## Contact

This page provides a way for potential clients to reach out regarding their projects. Options include sending a message or scheduling a discovery call.

### Get in Touch
- **Send a Message**: Fill out a form regarding project details, which will receive a response within 1 business day.
- **Book a Call**: A free 15-minute call can be booked for quicker discussions about project needs.

### Other Ways to Connect
- Email: [jon@jpgerton.com](mailto:jon@jpgerton.com)
- GitHub: [@jgerton](https://github.com/jgerton)
- LinkedIn: [Jon Gerton](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jon-gerton-8009a9393/)

## Services

Here, the offerings of the site are outlined, focusing on transparent pricing and professional results. The main services include:

### $500 WordPress Sites
Designed for local businesses that need a quick online presence:
- Launch in 5 business days
- Mobile-friendly design
- Basic SEO and a contact form
- One round of revisions and 30 days of support included

### Custom Web Applications
For businesses with specific needs, these solutions are tailored with:
- Modern tech stack considerations
- Ongoing maintenance and training included

### Team Growth Accelerator
This service is aimed at helping developers level up their skills through personalized mentorship.

### What Every WordPress Site Includes
- Mobile-responsive design
- Basic SEO setup
- 24/7 contact capabilities
- Content training for updates

### Frequently Asked Questions
Addresses key concerns about the web development process including timelines, package inclusions, and support details.

### Ready to Get Started?
Encourages visitors to book a free call or get started with their web project.

A page that confirms receipt of inquiries, detailing the next steps including project review and potential follow-up discussions.

This website encapsulates a dedicated approach to web development, focusing on delivering value to local businesses through efficient and clear communication, and professional web solutions.
